name: TenYearProbabilityOfHipFracture
title: Ten year probability of hip fracture
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a ten-year probability of all major osteoporosis-related fracture as determined by the Fracture Risk Assessment Tool (FRAX).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Assessment, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying ten-year probability of all major osteoporosis-related fracture as determined by the FRAX. This is a grouping of a SNOMED CT code.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Major osteoporotic fracture 10-year probability [Likelihood] Fracture Risk Assessment

contains.display: Major osteoporotic fracture 10-year probability [Likelihood] Fracture Risk Assessment
